title: 820-01521: Not powering up
message:
Have this board, that appears to be good, just not booting up. When i attempt to revive i get this message, "Configurator could not perform the requested action because the device is not in recovery mode."

When i attempt restore, i get this message, "Can't restore device in this state - please reboot into Recovery or DFU [com.apple.MobileDevice.MobileRestore – 0xFA0 (4000)]"

Every time i restart i end up with the same screen, a lock image and not the DFU image.

Any suggestions on how to get back into DFU mode.

title: 820-01521: Not powering up
message:
Something went wrong with T2.
Recently had similar problem.
Usually affected by liquid spill on audio board.
Some T2 data lines are too close to PPBUS_G3H, on the flex also.
